resources.string: Mandelbrot for Android v0.3 by Raphael.

This activity computes a Mandelbrot fractal. You can select the portion you want to zoom in and go back to the previous zoom level at any time.
Keys:
- Select or Enter: Enter/validate selection.
- DPad cursor: Move selection.
- Side volume keys: Zoom in/out selection
- Back: Goes back in computation history.
